actions.name: Sting
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4 damage) piercing damage. Additionally, if the sunfly is on an Outer Plane, it injects the target with a toxin, the effect of which is determined by the sunfly's location:

actions.name: Upper Plane
entries: The target sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Neutral Plane
entries: If the target is {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell or similar effect, it makes the Constitution saving throw with disadvantage to maintain its {@status concentration}.

actions.name: Lower Plane
entries: The target's speed is reduced by 5 feet until the end of its next turn.
